div.h6: Global Tech offers Spanish as world language for all grades!
Students at Global Tech Academy have access to individual laptops that enhances the educational experience!
Worried about childcare on our half-day Fridays?
div.p: Global Tech offers childcare for working parents every Friday afternoon from 12:30pm-4:00pm during the academies half-day professional development!
See how we go beyond curriculum mandates by offering Spanish education, after school programs, tutoring, and more!

Global Tech Academy is placed in a diversely rich community that encourages students to think globally and become engaged citizens that give back for a better future for themselves through education and service. We're always up to date on technology and academic standards, see for yourself and contact us today!

Global Tech Academy’s curriculum will be sufficiently broad to allow students the
opportunity to study a range of subjects including: English Language Arts, Mathematics,
Spanish Language, Science, Social Studies, PE, Technology, Art and Music.

Global Tech Academy is a multicultural, public school focused on educating the whole child in a nurturing environment. All students are guaranteed a safe, secure and orderly environment and have the opportunity to develop, learn, and achieve their own individual excellence.

p.a: My name is Robin Nicole Tolbert. I'm known to many as "Niki"! I'm a happily married mother of five children ranging in ages 6 years to 27 years old (3 girls and 2 boys). I was born in Detroit, Michigan but have lived in Ypsilanti most of my life. I have always had a passion for teaching children so I attended Eastern Michigan University and recieved a Bachelor's Degree in Elementary Education.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-purple
a.title: Bridge Academy Curriculum

div.h6: Students at Global Tech Academy have access to individual laptops that enhances the educational experience!

div.p: Comfortable work area where students are treated like the young adults they are
Science, technology, engineering, art, and mathematics, is all part of the curriculum at Global Tech Academy.
Enrolled students enjoyed the experience of learning at Global Tech Academy in a learning environment that is focused on the whole child and the community.
Caring and professional educators available at our Academy are fully certified educators licensed by the Michigan Department of Education.

td.div: Although buildings are closed for the 2019-2020 school year, GEE E-Learning continues! Important message from our Director and Superintendent
